backend/main.mo: Defines product, variant, and setting types with comparison utilities and initializes a default product catalog in a Motoko actor.
feature_evidence.json: Contains a feature evidence report linking a header logo size-increase request to the TopNav.tsx component and related metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries for various frontend components, pages, hooks, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Sets global Tailwind base styles and defines extensive OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx as a module script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router with root, landing, and shop routes wrapped in the SiteLayout component.
frontend/src/components/landing/CropsHer: Canvas-based animated hero section rendering a swaying crops effect with text overlays.
frontend/src/components/landing/ScrollRe: Scroll-driven reveal component that animates opacity, scale, and position of the Jumbo product section.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the global layout including TopNav, routed page content, and a detailed footer with branding links.
frontend/src/components/nav/TopNav.tsx: Sticky navigation bar with an enlarged logo, page navigation buttons, and a cart item count badge.
frontend/src/components/shop/CartSummary: Displays cart items, totals, and actions to clear the cart or proceed to checkout.
frontend/src/components/shop/ProductCard: Renders product details with image, price, specs, and controls to add or remove items from the cart.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login, logout, and identity management using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Fetches product list from the backend actor using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollProgress.ts: Calculates scroll progress for a referenced container based on viewport position.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, custom color variables, animations, and global layout behavior.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with hero, feature highlights, and a CTA to navigate to the shop.
frontend/src/pages/ShopPage.tsx: Displays product grid with loading and error states and a sticky cart summary.
frontend/src/store/cart.ts: Defines a persisted Zustand store for cart items with add, remove, clear, quantity lookup, total items, and total price utilities.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending typography, colors, fonts, animations, and container settings for the project's styling.
